name: Elevator Out of Action
description:
An homage to old school 80's arcade games like Crazy Climber.

You need to get to the top of the building but the elevator and stairs are out. The only way up is using helium filled balloons.

Watch out for falling plants and cats.

Audio is minimal as we didn't have time to put much together and weren't able to get a floater. We'll probably fix that up after the jam.
